item.title: Python: Threads, Processes and Concurrency
item.description: Credit:1 Understand the world of Python concurrency: threads, processes, coroutines and asynchronous programming with a realistic examples. Motivation As a data scientist who is spending more and more time on software engineering, I was recently forced to confront an ugly gap in my knowledge of Python: concurrency. To be honest, I never completely understood how the terms async, threads, pools and coroutines were different and how these mechanisms could work together.
